title: Impact Corrupts...Alternatives?
content:
I have had the frequent problem with Impact corrupting. I needed it to modify existing files created prior to my hiring. Does ayone have alternatives to suggest instead of Impact?   
   
Perhaps Compacta or House Gothic? Any others?
author: kojo

comments.content:
maybe this corrupting feature could be added to Arial,   
Times NR, Comic Sans, and other "defaults" -- there's a   
lot of potential here!

Aha! You've been given a rare gift - forced to use something   
_other_ than Impact. [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131138/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/7855.html) are some similar compact sans.
